jobDescription: Why You'll Love Working Here: Working at TechSmith gives you a chance to hone your skills in an open, collaborative, and innovative environment where you can be excited to come into work every single day.  We are a technological melting pot, comprised of nearly 250 uniquely skilled human beings that will continue to stretch your comfort zone – but in a good way. And speaking of comfort, who doesn’t love to show up to work in jeans, eat free snacks, and drink free pop?  With great products and great people behind them, we are always looking for passionate, fun, and hardworking individuals who truly enjoy coming to work and doing what they love. Sounds like you? We’d love to chat. Position Overview: The Social Support intern will help monitor audience interactions across TechSmith’s social media channels and other relevant online community groups.  This position will support customers by providing high quality customer service and technical support by responding to questions and concerns, interacting with their comments, and providing helpful responses across a variety of TechSmith brand pages and social platforms.  This role also includes an element of content creation for digital channels, such as writing and reviewing copy for social media posts, blog posts, customer stories, and repurposing content for digital channels as assigned.  You will help ensure that the content TechSmith creates and shares is high quality, interesting, original, on brand, and appealing for appropriate target audiences across our social platforms. Responsibilities:Learn how to use project management software and other tools to complete recurring tasks, assignments, meet project due dates, and coordinate work with other team membersLearn various tools and platforms involved in this role, such as Sprout, Bambu, WordPress and YouTubeMonitor social media channels and interact with TechSmith’s audience by answering customer-service related questions, offering helpful instructional content, categorizing incoming feedback, and forwarding/tasking inbound messages internally.Learn and follow TechSmith brand guidelines to ensure all content uses a consistent tone and voiceProactively visit a list of provided influencer contacts and organizations’ social media pages to retweet, share, like, and comment on their contentResearch and review articles for publishing on social media platforms, noting relevant takeaways and writing accompanying post textHelp identify new influencers within TechSmith’s target audiencesActively participate in content marketing and social strategy brainstorming meetingsOther duties and projects as assignedRequired Skills and Background:Experience in customer serviceAbility to communicate effectivelyAbility to work well independently as well as in groupsSelf-motivated and able to keep work on track and meet deadlinesAbility to give and receive detailed feedbackComfortable working on multiple projects simultaneouslyDuring school, you must be able to work a minimum of 15 hours per week, maximum 28 hours per weekYou must be legally authorized to work in the United States without an employer-sponsored petition for a visa, such as an H-1B visa. TechSmith does not intend to file any visa applications in connection with this opening.You must be legally authorized to work in the United StatesYou must be enrolled full-time in classes to be considered for an internship with TechSmith CorporationCompensation and Perks: Competitive pay based on skills and experience. This is an hourly position with TechSmith Corporation. Hours are based on a consensus between you and your supervisor. We require a minimum of 15 hours per week, however hours are limited to 28 hours per week.
